text: Hey all! I am seeking recommendations for career counselors who review resumes and cover letters for a fee.  I am looking especially for a counselor who has experience recruiting for content marketing and marketing writing roles for small to medium-sized businesses and enterprise companies in the software and tech industry and B2B.  Big plus if they have worked with career changers who want to transition to content marketing from another field. I appreciate any leads and suggestions!
